title.text: RFC 9006: TCP Usage Guidance in the Internet of Things (IoT)

contents.text:
+---------------+
        o     o <-------- TCP communication -----> |               |
       o     o                                     |               |
          o     o                                  | Unconstrained |
    o        o              +-----------+          |    device     |
        o     o   o  ------ | Middlebox |  ------- |               |
         o   o              +-----------+          | (e.g., cloud) |
       o    o  o                                   |               |
                                                   +---------------+
   Constrained devices
